page.title: 10MYNYDDBACH CHOIR, SWANSEA
page.content: The choir includes 60 girls (11 to 18) who rehearse at lunchtime every day. It changes each year because of the new entrants to the school and the school leavers. The choir has given many charity concerts and has competed in the Urdd, Llangollen and National Eisteddfodau. In 1982 the choir gained first prize in both school choir competitions at the Swansea National Eisteddfod and in 1985 first prize at the Pontrhyfendigaid Eisteddfod's school competition. The choir have performed a televised workshop of Holst's "Planets". In 1981 they appeared with the Welsh Symphony Orchestra. In 1984 they took part in a BBC Wales broadcast. In 1977 and 1981 they went to Mannheim (Swansea's twin town). The musical director since 1974 has been Eric Jones, the school's Head of Music.
